pageContext.claim: “As a matter of National Security I've signed the Omnibus Spending Bill. I say to Congress: I will NEVER sign another bill like this again. To prevent this omnibus situation from ever happening again, I'm calling on Congress to give me a line-item veto for all govt spending bills!”
pageContext.analysis: The president needs to catch up on his civics. The line-item veto is not something that Congress can reinstall. It was revoked by the Supreme Court in 1998. Congress has to obey Supreme Court precedents just like the rest of us.
